dt-api.name: searchBuilder.rebuild()
dt-api.summary: Rebuild the search to a given state

type.description: Rebuilds the search to be the same as that provided by the `details` parameter.
type.parameter: Object of the same structure as returned by `-api searchBuilder.getDetails()`

dt-api.description:
This method provides the ability to set the search in SearchBuilder.
`-init searchBuilder.rebuild()` takes one argument, it is an `-type object` in the same structure as is returned from `-api searchBuilder.getDetails()` and is the basis for the rebuild. If no argument is given, the search will be cleared.
